question:
You have been living in a rental apartment for the past year. Recently a new neighbour moved in and has been making a lot of noise, which disturbs you.
Write a letter to the landlord. In your letter:
explain the situation
describe why it bothers you
suggest a solution
text: I am writing this missive to let you know that I am living on the fourth floor of your green park apartment and I have completed my one year in the apartment on January 15th 2022.

Let me explain my situation,my office working hours starts from 8:00 pm in the night and it ends at 7:00 am.Thus,after returning to my house from work and getting to bed for sleep I constantly heard lot music that has been played by our new neighbours.They live just adjucting to our apartment.

Though,I don't mind if they play music but the sound is very high which disturbs me a lot.As a result,its been around two weeks I am not able to sleep properly.Due to this reason I am not as much productive in my work as the company expects.My manager has also warned me that if there is no improvement in my tasks then I may get demotion.

Furthermore,From my point of view you should address this problem immediately by contacting the landlord of the apartment where the new tenants are living inspite of requesting them several times to low down the volume of music they have ignored my words.
I hope to hear from you soon
